title: Carhartt Women's Base Force Cold Weather Crew Neck Top
description: A Carhartt layering piece that's ideal for a well-stocked wardrobe. The perfect stretch fabrication with an athletic fit and feel. FastDry technology for quick moisture wicking and Stain Breaker technology that releases stains. Round-neck tee in a pullover design. Printed neck label. Long raglan sleeves with thumb-hole cuffs. Reinforced stitching throughout. Droptail hemline. 51 cotton, 43 polyester, 6 spandex. Machine wash cold, tumble dry low. Imported. Measurements Length 26 in Product measurements were taken using size XS. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
